sub_title: Senior advisor Education Council of the Netherlands bij Onderwijsraad
summary: As a Haitian-Dutch scholar with a professional background in Sociology (PhD), Anthropology (MSc) and Journalism (BA), I’m dedicated to increasing Equity in Education.

treasury_media.title: Stam (2020). Losing white privilege? Exploring whiteness as a resource for ‘white’ Dutch girls in a racially diverse school
treasury_media.description: This article examines whether ‘white’ Dutch working-class students experience white privilege and if so, how they make use of it as a resource in their school settings.

profile_positions.description: Samen met prof. Jaco Dagevos begeleiden we B.J. van der Ent – van den Berg met haar proefschrift: ’Rebuilding Young Lives. A study on the experiences of young, Syrian-born people with a refugee background during their first years in Rotterdam‘.
profile_positions.title: Co-Supervisor PhD Candidate Sociology
Academic Coordinator Master Honours Programme Tackling Inequalities

profile_positions.description: Research project 'Making Rotterdam’s children more resilient: Closing the socio-economic/ethnic gap in pupils’ school performances by strengthening partnerships between parents, schools, and children'. We worked in close collaboration with the municipality of Rotterdam.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Supervision of BSc. & MSc. theses Sociology

Teaching
- Social Inequalities: An introduction (master level)
- Sociaal wetenschappelijk onderzoek (master level)
- Social Science Research in Practice (master level)
- Advanced Research Methods (master level)
- Doing Ethnography (PhD level)
profile_positions.title: University Lecturer

profile_positions.description: For an international research project ‘Reducing Early School Leaving in Europe (RESL.eu)’, I was responsible for the Dutch longitudinal mixed-methods data collection in secondary schools & mbo’s, and worked on the analyses, writing and dissemination.
profile_positions.title: Academic Researcher

profile_positions.description: Studenten en jonge onderzoekers afkomstig uit het Nederlands-Caraïbisch gebied, bij voorkeur van Marron-afkomst, kunnen subsidie aanvragen ter ondersteuning van de voorbereiding van een wetenschappelijke publicatie in de sfeer van de geschiedenis of cultuur van de Caraïben.
profile_positions.title: Beoordelingscommissie lid Dr. Silvia de Groot fonds

profile_positions.description:
Directed and produced two short video documentaries in Africa:
1. On entrepreneurship in South Sudan, which is linked to on-going PhD research of Mr Twijnstra for Wageningen University.
2. On food security and returnee livelihoods after the war in Northern Uganda, which is linked to on-going PhD research of Ms Wairimu for Wageningen University.

Camera: Jefrim Rothuizen
Editor: Patrick Schonewille
profile_positions.title: Documentary Filmmaker (freelance)

profile_positions.description: For the IS Academy Human Security in Fragile States, a collaborative research project between Wageningen University - Disaster Studies, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cordaid Haiti.
profile_positions.title: Academic Coordinator Haiti

profile_positions.description: Radio reports for VPRO Bureau Buitenland, broadcasted on January 13, 2013; March 30, 2011, June 30, 2010; June 25, 2010; and June 17, 2010.

profile_positions.description: Monthly produced stories for IS Magazine, but also made contributions to other Dutch media, including: Villa VPRO, BNN Today, KRO Goedemorgen Nederland, Trouw, 10 Minuten (Surinam children's news), Oxfam-Novib, SHO/Giro 555.
